text: owun gananin 200 k pamana we.

ee anuwa bandara mahatha wisin diyaniyawa anuradhapura yapanaya handiya pradeshaye tharunayaku wisin pahara gena gos athi bawata paminili karanu labuwath thambauththegama polisiye niladharin parikshana katayuthu sandaha unanduwak nodakwana bawath, awurudu 18kata wadi tharuniya tharunayaku samanga gos sitina nisa athadanguwata ganimata nohaki yayi pawasu bawath ee mahatha pawasa sitiyeya.

2015 janawari 9da udasana rajya wirodhi kumanthranayak sambandhayen sakapita kurunagala polwaththaka sitiya di athadannguwata gath janadhipathi apekshaka maithripala sirisena mahatha mema 09da wana wita siya anduru kutiya thula wasaraka kalayak sampurna karayi.

dinamina puwathpatha wenuwen siya kalaya kapa karamin kriya kala dirimath pudgalayaku wu ohu, patakayage rasagnyathawa wadi diyunu kirimata sama witekama katayuthu kale ya.1995 – 1997 kalaya thula dinamina puwathpathata diridun ohu, sarath kure nam wanneya.

shri lanka surakumpath saha winimaya komishan sabhawa saha kolambaa kotas huwamaruwa ekwa pawathwanu labana ‘kotas welenda pola nagarayen nagarayata’ aayojaka sammanthrana malawe 12 wani sammanthranaya 2018 juli masa 25 wani dina anuradhapuraya, goldan mango risot hotalayedi pawathwa thibe.
aya kala me upakaraya mata mage jiwithaye marenathurawata amathaka wanne na.

kumariyage maranayen dadi lesa shokayata pathwu raja kumarayage denethwalin gala giya kadulu ekathukara dewiyan wisin mema diya alla nirmanaya keranu bawa kiyawe.

bohoma issara kalaye indiyawe laukika dhyana balaya praguna karapu isiwaru yogi waru wadi pramanayak wiya.in boho dena gihi jiwithayen iwath wi wanagathawa thawus dam rakimin diwi gewamin swakiya dhyana balaya wadi diyunu kara ganimin jiwath wuha.thawath aya wiwaha wi ambau daruwan samagin jiwath wiya..gauthiya muniwaraya melesa laukika dhyana balaya upadawa swakiya ambauwa samanga himalaya aashitha wanapedesaka jiwath wu balasampanna muniwarayeki.gauthiya muni warayage laukika sruddhi balaya mahath wiya.diwya loka brahma loka walata sruddhi balayen gaman kirime hakiyawa ohuta wiya.

janatha wimukthi peramuna parlimenthuwata idiripath karana lada 20 wana aandukrama wyawastha sanshodhana panath ketumpatha abhiyogayata lak karamin parlimenthu manthri udaya gammanpila eeye shreshtadhikaranaya hamuwe gonu kala pethsama sambandhayen hiru prawruththi anshayata adahas dakwaminuyi ohu me bawa kiya sitiye.mema ketumpatha aandukrama wyawasthawata patahani bawin eya janamatha wicharanayakin sammatha kala yuthu bawata niyogayak nikuth karana lesayi parlimenthu manthri udaya gammanpila pethsama magin illa aththe.widhayaka janadhipathi dhuraya sanshodhanaya kirima sandaha wu wisiwana wyawastha sanshodhana panath ketumpatha janatha wimukthi peramuna pasugiya 5 wana da parlimenthuwata idiripath karanu labuwa.
pra, kathawa therunna!

aalokaye prathipala nam, siyalu aakara yahapathkamath, damitukamath, sabakamath ya. 10 samindanan wahanseta priya manapa de kumak da yi wimasa balanna. 11 andhakaraye nishpala kriyawalata hawul nowi, eewa elikaranna. 12 sabawin ma owun rahasigatha wa karana de gana katha kirima pawa pilikulaki. 13 eheth aalokayen eli wana siyalle niyama swabhawaya saksudak se pahadili wa peneyi. 14 ese eli wana de aalokaya bawata hare.
